article_title: New approach could help lessen arm woes
article_text:
Endangered arms This is the third in a series of stories that will appear during the College World Series about the pitching injury epidemic in baseball.

Posted:

Posted in CWS, Sports, Local-sports on Saturday, June 21, 2014 1:00 am.

og.description: On a makeshift pitcher’s mound outside Omaha Westside High School, a teenager learns to throw like Bob Gibson.
